Body: I know the question How to buy an app for a friend? about buying an app for a friend. However, I need to buy a package of multiple applications for my friend; actually for many friends.To buy single apps individually is absolutely too time consuming when having multiple friends. I cannot find any selection tool for buying multiple apps for friends. I would like to make a package of applications that I can buy for my friends at once. For instance, 5 years of Premium licences for a group of friends.How can you buy a package of apps for your friend(s)?
Title: How can you buy a package of apps for your friend(s)?

history.Text: I would like to donate some licences for my friends as a package:- serverauditor- ... I cannot find any donate button in their homepage. The application is just an example. I would like to make a package of applications that I can donate for my friends at once. For instance, 5 years of Premium licences.How can you donate Premium licences of some android applications for your friends?
To donate package of licences for other Android Phones?

history.Comment: the thread linked is not the same as this one . I need for my developers a package of paid applications
history.Text: I know this thread [How to buy an app for a friend?][1] about buying a app for a friend.However, I need to buy a package of many applications for my friend; actually for many friends. To buy single apps individually is absolutely too time consuming when having many friends.  I cannot find any selection tool for buying many apps for friends. I would like to make a package of applications that I can buy for my friends at once. For instance, 5 years of Premium licences for a group of friends.How can you buy a package of apps for your friend?How can you buy a package of apps for your friends? history.Text: I know the question [How to buy an app for a friend?][1] about buying an app for a friend. However, I need to buy a package of multiple applications for my friend; actually for many friends. To buy single apps individually is absolutely too time consuming when having multiple friends.  I cannot find any selection tool for buying multiple apps for friends. I would like to make a package of applications that I can buy for my friends at once. For instance, 5 years of Premium licences for a group of friends.How can you buy a package of apps for your friend(s)?  [1]: http://android.stackexchange.com/q/3983/9897
How can you buy a package of apps for your friend(s)?
